law.catch_line: Kentucky Medal for Freedom -- Eligibility -- Administrative regulations -- Funds to defray costs.

text.section: The department shall enter the name of a recipient of the Kentucky Medal for Freedom on the Kentucky Medal for Freedom roll.
The department shall promulgate administrative regulations in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A to carry out the provisions of this section.
The department may receive funds from the veterans' program trust fund to defray the cost of the Kentucky Medal for Freedom.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 2, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 26, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2008.
